import { style } from '@angular/animations'; import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'], }) export class AppComponent { showText(element: HTMLElement) { element.style.display = 'block'; } }
